| HistoryText             = The Flaming Sword was a terrorist group that obtained armaments from the [[Andreas Kapelos (Earth-616)|Arms Merchant]] and also had [[Richard Dennison (Earth-616)|Firebrand]] to aid them. They were actually more of a crew of armed robbers and thieves that used the guise of an environmentalist group to turn public opinion in their favor, a strategy which worked with reporters when they fought the [[Avengers (Earth-616)|Avengers]], even though they took hostages.{{r|Avengers Vol 3 0}}
